text: Mojmir Sepe (11 July 1930 – 24 December 2020) was a Slovenian composer, conductor, arranger and trumpeter. His career began in 1950. Sepe was born in Jazbina, Črna na Koroškem, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. He composed two Eurovision songs: "Brez besed" (1966) and "Pridi, dala ti bom cvet" (1970). Sepe died on 24 December 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovenian writers Category:Slovenian composers Category:Conductors Category:Trumpeters
title: Mojmir Sepe
